name: Gods Of Hell
description:
Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam 2020 Submission

Theme: Out of Control

Game Framework: MonoGame

Description:

You are the Madman of Hell. Defying the Gods of Hell.

Fight the Gods of Hell!

How it relates to the theme:

Inspired by lyrics of Battle Beast song.

"Out of control

Without any fear of facing the madman
Out of control
Defying the Gods of Hell
You are out of control"
